Container.Overview: Mopidy is an extensible music server written in Python.
Container.Description: This build is intended to be used on Unraid. Mopidy plays music from local disk, Spotify, SoundCloud, TuneIn, and more. You can edit the playlist from any phone, tablet, or computer using a variety of MPD and web clients.
